title: The Awful Story of The Horrible Post
content: Once upon a time I wrote the worst post ever. Now it's stuck in a database with no way out. The End!

title: What If Posts Were Real?
content: Believe, for a moment -- and I know this will require a great deal of suspension of disbelief in order not to immediately dissent on the matter, because as we know, to simply assume a position not out of argument but out of conviction in holding an opinion regardless of its truthfulness is to open the door to all manner of judgements which may be disconnected from the world of experience and thus ultimately not only untethered from application towards the real purpose of belief, which is to guide good conduct, but ultimately confuse the one who adopts the argument and cause social and mental harm -- that posts were real.

title: Hello
content: Hello to every blogger in the world. This is my post and I love it dearly.
